participant_1.background:
I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.
My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one.
i have taken formal music lessons since i was 5.
my favorite class is painting.

participant_2.background:
I'm enjoying my life with my cat and hoping to find someone to share it with.
I enjoy the freedom of riding my bike.
I collect memories of my best friend from out of town.
I wake up, take my dog, Collie, for a walk and then drink the day away.
My worst fear is that I will lose my sense of humor.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
Pretty good! I'm just getting started with work.
Oh nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a waitress at a small, family-owned restaurant.
That sounds fun! I always admire people who can handle working in a restaurant.
Thanks! It can be tough, but it's also really rewarding.
What's your favorite part of the job?
I love getting to meet new people and make them feel at home.
That's so nice! What's your least favorite part?
The long hours can be tough, but it's worth it.
I can imagine! What do you like to do outside of work?
I love to paint and play music!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to paint.
It's really fun! I've been taking lessons since I was 5.
Thanks! I'm pretty proud of myself.
